physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a group of people. All of them are looking towards the direction where the photograph was captured. There are four rows of people
 with the ones in the front row sitting on the ground. A number of them are holding onto their rifles. There is a sign at the centre at the photograph
 at the last row of people.  Resolution of phootgraph is not high enough to identify more details.

sgcool_label_text:This photograph shows members of the Sharpshooters Society of the Crown Prince of Netherlands posing with their rifles. \r\n\r\nWith continuous improvement of camera technology
 it became possible to take photographs outside a studio in the first decades of the 20th century. Many middle-class families collected photographs in albums as a way of documenting family life
 or documentasi keluarga.

All of them are looking towards the direction where the photograph was captured. There are four rows of people, with the ones in the front row sitting on the ground. A number of them are holding onto their rifles. There is a sign at the centre at the photograph, at the last row of people.  Resolution of phootgraph is not high enough to identify more details.

metadata.sgcool_label_text:
This photograph shows members of the Sharpshooters Society of the Crown Prince of Netherlands posing with their rifles. 

With continuous improvement of camera technology, it became possible to take photographs outside a studio in the first decades of the 20th century. Many middle-class families collected photographs in albums as a way of documenting family life, or documentasi keluarga.
